product_name: Seattle Sports Pocket Bowl - Special Buy
long_description: Save space in your pack with this full-size, re-usable camp bowl-when collapsed it's the same size as a deck of cards. Durable urethane-coated 200-denier nylon body and 500-denier bottom; welded seams remain pliable and leak-proof. Inner perimeter lip holds the bowl open and prevents the contents from sloshing out. Special buy.
short_description: Save space in your pack with this full-size, re-usable camp bowl-when collapsed it's the same size as a deck of cards.
